column4: recently we have switched couple workstations in the office from windows to ubuntu linux. Some users have really problem weth this environment and I'm just wondering if anyone can recommend in documentation for simple users..? NOT for admin
i hope you're using Gnome ubuntu, right?
yes gnome
does Main Menu > System > Help do anything?
Dapper or Edgy?
I need somethink which is not for IT people
dapper
they've expressed a lack of understanding with the provided help files/
yep...I'll look at that... thanks
otherwise another good bet might be setting aside a day for training
we have already buy a book to see if that will work but all books ara more for linux users which have experiance with OSs. We need somethink about creating directories files, navigating email
training is also good option ...
wikibooks.org has "Linux for Newbies"
this is not going to be an easy task. however, you should just have to point them to Gnome's docs, there's a Help > Contents menu item in most Gnome programs
Nautilus handles creating directories, etc..., the program they use handles creating files, the rest is just telling them what programs to use for what purposes

what I find out is: If user did not have experiance with PC's before and windows they do not complain and thay learn quicly how ever the other employees which have been using windows for many years that complain and are not wiling to learn just that easy that I point them to doc files:-)

i completely sympathize, i just installed edgy on a friend's computer yesterday. he'll be all over me for advice for the next few months... computer users get frightened when they dont know what to do, and fear makes people angry... at you
anger and frustration !! Nothing is working !!! that's what they say !!! :-)
just imagine if you installed OS X, even more radically different from windows
I have a problem with OS X :-)) I'm more keen to command line approach !!! But thats only me these days..
for example this: https://help.ubuntu.com/6.10/ubuntu/desktopguide/C/index.html there is nothing what I can give to our employyes to read..:-(

yeah, that's what the internal help files look like. um... might just be best to give some training and tell them to understand that learning won't come overnight. how long did it take them to learn windows?
I'm big fan of windows2linux switch but with this documentation we never manage to switch ordinary pc users to linux
ok dude...I need to go..thanks for a help...have a great day !!
